Articles.Content:
Well, let's discuss roblox here.

I absolutely hate it as it has the most immature, disgusting and annoying community on the Internet. It is a good concept ruined by greed.

What do you think about roblox?
Roblox, eh? I'm a veteran of it, actually. Loved playing it back then, but now it seems we share the same hate. but that was years ago.
What exactly is Roblox?
Why would you make a thread about something you dislike?
I used to play the .... out of it and have fun with it, don't play anymore with the rumors of uber-bad community.

I was also a old player of that game (Since 2008). Actually its like hell to me now, everything copies everything, constant flame wars, and the other things that killed the fun of playing that.

Sometimes whit some friends we play on places just for the lulz *Insert chat trolling intensifies meme here for better explanation*, But only there, Ã‚Â¡I swear!.
still a good game. if you know where to look for SCIENCE GROUPS!

Roblox, stylized as RÃ…Å’BLOX, is a massively multiplayer online game created and marketed toward children and teenagers aged 8Ã¢â‚¬â€œ18. In the game, players are able to create their own virtual world, in which they or other members may enter and socialize within the blocks of varying shapes, sizes, and colors.
So, Second Life for kids?

still a good game. if you know where to look for SCIENCE GROUPS!

A game is not good if you have to spend a long time looking for something that is not p2w or copied. 80% of the most popular games are copies with different pictures, which is sad.

I've seen the gameplay on YouTube. It does not look interesting to me, at all. It looks like a crippled, buggy, cheap version of Minecraft. Add the fact it's a massive multiplayer online game and it makes me cringe.

A game is not good if you have to spend a long time looking for something that is not p2w or copied. 80% of the most popular games are copies with different pictures, which is sad.

and the originals are never visited....

and the originals are never visited....

^^^^

This.

It hurts me to see my beloved games be empty and forgotten forever while copies make hundreds of dollars in real money equivalent.

There is a great game which is a multiplayer spaceflight game where you could ride a shuttle to the iss and back, do EVA or fly to the moon and back on a Saturn V.

Now it's trashed, copied and forgotten.

^^^^

I know..... AND ISS AIRLOCK 01 NEVER WORKS ON THE COPIED ONES!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

it is not MMO. it is a lot of separate games.

the only way to protect this is copylock, and even then you can manualy copy. I think there is a copy of INovation right now which is failing
A good idea ruined by the community and administration.

A good idea ruined by the community and administration.

The admins are so bad that I never saw anything adminish happen. I think they probably just play games and ban everyone they don't like.

I seriously think this is the worst community in the world.

P.S: I think the mudkips in your avatar are asking for more personal space.

The admins are so bad that I never saw anything adminish happen.

they do ban MAJOR rule breaks. (as in things that would need to be censored to be put here. and not swear words.)

I seriously think this is the worst community in the world.

as a whole, yes. there are a few well-organised groups left though.

they do ban MAJOR rule breaks. (as in things that would need to be censored to be put here. and not swear words.)

as a whole, yes. there are a few well-organised groups left though.

No, I was talking about banning people just because you don't like them and feel like showing your power. Aka. Admin abuse.

Oh great, that 1 reply i made sparked all this. XD

Anyway, i inhabited ROBLOX just RIGHT before it went to crap. After that, i decided i got too old for it and moved onto minecraft, then blockland, then steam games (TF2, universe sandbox 1, etc. until i saw KSP up for grabs in the store. First time i saw it, thought it was a crappy goofy unrealistic game. fortunately, my 6th sense convinced me to look into it and play the demo. And that's when it sucked me into this wonderland of joys.

Oh great, that 1 reply i made sparked all this. XD

Anyway, i inhabited ROBLOX just RIGHT before it went to crap. After that, i decided i got too old for it and moved onto minecraft, then blockland, then steam games (TF2, universe sandbox 1, etc. until i saw KSP up for grabs in the store. First time i saw it, thought it was a crappy goofy unrealistic game. fortunately, my 6th sense convinced me to look into it and play the demo. And that's when it sucked me into this wonderland of joys.

I inhabited Roblox and rode it down to hell. I joined what it was awesome, and left when it had gone terrible. Now I have a good assortment of games. Elite dangerous, space station 13, space enginers and ksp.

I joined what it was awesome, and left when it had gone terrible.

So you are telling us you ruined it?

So you are telling us you ruined it?

No, I did not contribute to the game in any meaningful way as it is not worth it. Nowadays a famous game maker has two futures to choose from:

1. Get copied and forgotten

2. Put insane amounts of unfair p2w in your game and market it as something else.
Miracle!!! Players in an orignal game!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
